Package org.mozilla.geckoview

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GeckoSession.ContentListener  
    GeckoSession.NavigationListener  
    GeckoSession.PermissionDelegate
    GeckoSession applications implement this interface to handle requests for permissions from content, such as geolocation and notifications.
    GeckoSession.PermissionDelegate.Callback
    Callback interface for notifying the result of a permission request.
    GeckoSession.PermissionDelegate.MediaCallback
    Callback interface for notifying the result of a media permission request, including which media source(s) to use.
    GeckoSession.ProgressListener  
    GeckoSession.PromptDelegate
    GeckoSession applications implement this interface to handle prompts triggered by content in the GeckoSession, such as alerts, authentication dialogs, and select list pickers.
    GeckoSession.PromptDelegate.AlertCallback
    Callback interface for notifying the result of a prompt, and for accessing the optional features for prompts (e.g.
    GeckoSession.PromptDelegate.AuthCallback
    Callback interface for notifying the result of authentication prompts.
    GeckoSession.PromptDelegate.ButtonCallback
    Callback interface for notifying the result of a button prompt.
    GeckoSession.PromptDelegate.ChoiceCallback
    Callback interface for notifying the result of menu or list choice.
    GeckoSession.PromptDelegate.FileCallback
    Callback interface for notifying the result of file prompts.
    GeckoSession.PromptDelegate.TextCallback
    Callback interface for notifying the result of prompts that have text results, including color and date/time pickers.
    GeckoSession.Response<T>
    This is used to send responses in delegate methods that have asynchronous responses.
    GeckoSession.ScrollListener
    GeckoSession applications implement this interface to handle content scroll events.
    GeckoSession.TrackingProtectionDelegate
    GeckoSession applications implement this interface to handle tracking protection events.
    TextInputController.Delegate  
    TextInputController.EditableClient  
    TextInputController.EditableListener

    TextInputController
    TextInputController handles text input for GeckoSession through key events or input methods.
